A4.text: The Grand Canyon, a Wonder of the World, is about 80 miles (130 km) northwest of Flagstaff.

A5.text: Flagstaff's proximity to Grand Canyon National Park, about 75 miles (121 km) north of the city, has made it a popular tourist destination since the mid-19th century.
